root.name: Angelique
root.description: OverviewAngelique is a dating sim otome game developed by Ruby Party, a division of Koei consisting fully of females. It was originally released on September 23, 1994 for the SNES, and has since been ported countless of times, often including additional features. Version DifferencesAngelique SpecialAngelique Special was the first port of the game. It was originally released on December 22, 1995 for PC-FX, and was later ported to PC, Sega Saturn, and PlayStation on March 29, 1996. It adds to the game voice acting by several big-name voice actors, in addition to new animated cutscenes. The PC version is said to be extremely hard to find. Angelique Voice Fantasy Angelique Voice Fantasy was released on the very same day as Angelique Special, and adds all of the voice acting found in Angelique Special to the original SNES game using a CD and an add-on deck called Voicer-kun. Angelique Duet Angelique Duet is the latest revision of the Angelique game. It was originally released on July 30, 1998 for Sega Saturn and PlayStation, and later ported to the Nintendo DS on April 6, 2006. The biggest addition to the game is the option to play as not only our usual heroine Angelique Limoges, but also her rival Rosalia de Catargena.

similar_games.game: Harukanaru Toki no Naka de: Yume no Ukihashi
